name: Peddle
tag_list: sell, car, vehicle, automotive, buying, offer
overview:
Peddle provides a fast and easy way to sell a car online. It is an alternative to posting a “for sale” ad, or bringing it to a location to sell or trade it in. Once the prospective vehicle is selected and it’s condition is entered, the user is provided with an instantly calculated offer to purchase the vehicle. If the offer is accepted, the user is connected with a carrier who will schedule a convient time to come to the vehicle’s location, make on-the-spot payment, and tow the car away.

The vehicle is then brought to the dealer or salvage yard that purchased it through Peddle, or it is sold at an automotive auction.

The company is private and bootstrapped, purchasing thousands of vehicles each month.
